actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Authorizing the President to proclaim 1993 as "America-the-Beautiful Year".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the year 1993 as the America-the-Beautiful Year, commemorating the 100th anniversary of the writing of the poem or hymn, "America the Beautiful."

titles.title: Authorizing the President to proclaim 1993 as "America-the-Beautiful Year".
